short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speechy uses AI based analysis to provide feedback and recommendations to passively improve your English speech.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speechy is an AI language coach that helps people improve their English skills. By connecting your Chrome browser to Speechy plugin you can allow the programme to analyze your speech and provide instant feedback on various aspects of English including grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation and others.
